meta.hint: Antonyms are words with opposite meanings.
meta.question: Identify the antonym of the word in the context.

content.description:
The sky was dark. After it rained, the sky was light again.
Select the antonym of the word in bold.

Did George say goodbye to you? I said hello to him at school.
Select the antonym of the word in bold.

He was wearing two different color socks but at least his shoes were the same.
Select the antonym of the word in bold.

You should try to make friends, and not enemies.
Select the antonym of the word in bold.

I thought we would be late, but we were early.
Select the antonym of the word in bold.
